title: Best carrot cake with cream cheese frosting
ingredients: ['For the cake', '350g soft brown sugar', '350ml sunflower oil', '3 large eggs', '350g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '350g grated carrots', '50g finely chopped pecans', '50g finely chopped walnuts', 'For the frosting', '450g full fat cream cheese', '100g butter, softened', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '300g icing sugar']
